TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

waiter! No. But after that lasagna?

waiter! Cream and sugar!

4 hours ago, AlamoVampire said:

cream of tartar

We are out of tar, waiting for the truck with it.


Waiter! 502 Bad Waitaways, please.

Sorry but the network is cold and wont apologize for its unnecessary aggression. Cant fix it.

waiter! Make the network apologize for being a cold bad-gateway

085507032024

We have removed bad Waitaways and replaced them with a new Waitress.

Waitress. A chocolate mousse for desert please.

Sorry sir the waitstaff state youre not allowed to order. You offended and angered the vampire. Its shown you your required duty.

waiter! savageness

One Thai Tom Yum Soup geyser style

waiter! Hug please

Susan was lazy so she got fired. Heres a salty napkin.

Waitress, a salad please.

Heres your word salad sandwich of the day, du jour, on the side, in a cup, on a bowl, in fries, on eggs, coriander, turmeric, spiced, veritable, vegitable, clove, garlic, and a comma

waiter! Elephant dandruff, Blonde with sand, Mystery in the alley, Wreck 'em, Burn the British, and Drag one through Georgia.

Your gelato, sir, with the best palm margarine.

Here you go, enjoy.

Waitress. What flavours of Gelato do you have please?

Miss we have the flavors of nothing as the gelato machine stopped working before it was installed.
